members.name: automaticleadscorescleanupEnabled

constantValues: If enabled, all existing lead scores associated with the model will be removed when the model is stopped. If disabled, lead scores will be left in the system even after stopping the model.

members.description: If enabled, all existing lead scores associated with the model will be removed when the model is stopped. If disabled, lead scores will be left in the system even after stopping the model.

members.name: automaticqualificationEnabled

constantValues: Allows leads that receive a score to become automatically marketing qualified in the "Lead-to-opportunity marketing sales process" business process

members.description: Allows leads that receive a score to become automatically marketing qualified in the "Lead-to-opportunity marketing sales process" business process

members.name: automaticSalesreadyEnabled

constantValues: Allows leads to automatically advance to sales-ready status in the "Lead-to-opportunity marketing sales process" business process

members.description: Allows leads to automatically advance to sales-ready status in the "Lead-to-opportunity marketing sales process" business process

members.name: name

constantValues: The name of the custom entity

members.description: The name of the custom entity

constantValues: Date and time when the record was created

members.name: createdOnBehalfBy

constantValues: Indicates the person who created this for another person.
